properties.name: Qa'le Hasan Ali Maars, Kerman County, Kerman Province, Iran
properties.description:
Qa'le Hasan Ali Maars, Kerman County, Kerman Province, Iran

Type: 397

Location: Iran

A group of maar craters clustered around village of Qa'le Hasan Ali, with 2 others lying 10 and 15 km to the NE, were originally thought to have impact origin, but Milton (1977) showed that they are in fact phreatomagmatic. The largest known as Great...

View on Mindat.org

properties.name: Sistan Suture Zone, Zahedan County, Sistan and Baluchestan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Sistan Suture Zone, Zahedan County, Sistan and Baluchestan Province, Iran

Type: 397

Location: Iran

NS-trending area between the Lut to the west and Afghan blocks in which there are major fractures and extensive areas of volcanics intercalated with sedimentary rocks.

View on Mindat.org
